cause.description:
WorldChanging.com works from a simple premise: that the tools, models and ideas for building a better future lie all around us. That plenty of people are working on tools for change, but the fields in which they work remain unconnected. That the motive, means and opportunity for profound positive change are already present.
more here: http://www.worldchanging.com/about/
also when you join this cause, make sure install the "i am green" application as well, every little helps: http://apps.facebook.com/iamgreen/view
1. Buying Green / Food and Farming / Sustainable Design / Collaboration / Emerging Technologies
2. Health / Education / Empowering Women / Philanthropy / Social Entrepreneurship / Arts and Culture
3. Transforming Business / Socially Responsible Investment / Bright Green Economy / Branding & Marketing
4. Climate Change / Sustainable Development / Biodiversity and Ecosystems / New Science / Imagining the Future
5. check out all the action here: http://worldchanging.com/
cause.mission: That another world is not just possible, it is here!
cause.name: WorldChanging - for a sustainable future
